subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Mavericks got 29 points from Josh Howard, their hobbled swingman, and 30 points from Dirk Nowitzki and pulled away in the final minutes for a victory over the Phoenix Suns.
snippet: The Mavericks got 29 points from Josh Howard, their hobbled swingman, and 30 points from Dirk Nowitzki and pulled away in the final minutes for a victory over the Phoenix Suns.
